greenhouse gas methane ch4 and nitrous oxide n2o emissions from paddy fields the experiment was performed in a split plot design with three replications the results showed that awd significantly 42 2 and 31 6 respectively significant differences p 0 05 in ghg emissions gwp and ghgi were observed between drought resistant rice varieties and hhz the rice variety 7y370 resulted in the lowest ch4 and n2o emissions gwp and ghgi among all varieties under both irrigation regimes these results indicate that the rice variety 7y370 can be recommended to simultaneously mitigate gwp and maintain grain
